description: A chocolate bar's sweet gesture with a map to symbolize finding love.
title: Sweetheart's Map
n_1: Barry plans a surprise for Coco with a map.
c1_1: “This map leads to a treasure, Coco!”
n_2: The map unfolds, revealing heart-shaped landmarks.
c1_2: “Every stop is a moment we cherished.”
n_3: They reach the final spot marked 'Her Heart'.
c1_3: “This journey was to find my way to your heart.”
c2_3: “Barry, you've always been there, right in my heart!”
n_4: Under the stars, they share a heartfelt embrace.
c1_4: “With you, Coco, every place is a treasure.”
c2_4: “And with you, Barry, my heart is full.”
